verses.text: I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* of the \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: with my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* will I make \w known|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* to \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 89.1 \ft Maschil…: or, A Psalm for Ethan the Ezrahite, to give instruction\f*\f + \fr 89.1 \ft to all…: Heb. to generation and generation\f*

For I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Mercy|strong="H2617"\w* shall be built \w up|strong="H1129"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* shalt thou \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* in the very \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

I have \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with my \w chosen|strong="H0972"\w*, I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*,

Thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* will I \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and build \w up|strong="H1129"\w* thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* to \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

And the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* also in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w saints|strong="H6918"\w*.

For who in the \w heaven|strong="H7834"\w* can be \w compared|strong="H6186"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? \add who\add* among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H0410"\w* can be \w likened|strong="H1819"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*?

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* is \w greatly|strong="H7227"\w* to be \w feared|strong="H6206"\w* in the \w assembly|strong="H5475"\w* of the \w saints|strong="H6918"\w*, and to be had in \w reverence|strong="H3372"\w* of all \add them that are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.

O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, who \add is\add* a \w strong|strong="H2626"\w* 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* like unto thee? or to thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee?

Thou \w rulest|strong="H4910"\w* the \w raging|strong="H1348"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: when the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof \w arise|strong="H7721"\w*, thou \w stillest|strong="H7623"\w* them.

Thou hast \w broken|strong="H1792"\w* \w Rahab|strong="H7294"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H1792"\w*, as one that is \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*; thou hast \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* with thy \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*.\f + \fr 89.10 \ft Rahab: or, Egypt\f*\f + \fr 89.10 \ft thy…: Heb. the arm of thy strength\f*

The \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \add are\add* thine, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* also \add is\add* thine: \add as for\add* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* and the \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof, thou hast \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* them.\f + \fr 89.11 \ft the fulness…: or, all it containeth\f*

The \w north|strong="H6828"\w* and the \w south|strong="H3225"\w* thou hast \w created|strong="H1254"\w* them: \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w* and \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w* in thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Thou hast a \w mighty|strong="H1369"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: \w strong|strong="H5810"\w* is thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \add and\add* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* is thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.\f + \fr 89.13 \ft a…: Heb. an arm with might\f*

\w Justice|strong="H6664"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* the \w habitation|strong="H4349"\w* of thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*: \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* shall \w go|strong="H6923"\w* before thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 89.14 \ft habitation: or, establishment\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the joyful \w sound|strong="H8643"\w*: they shall \w walk|strong="H1980"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of thy \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.
In thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall they \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and in thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* shall they be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

For thou \add art\add* the \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* of their \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: and in thy \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* our \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* shall be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* our \w defence|strong="H4043"\w*; and the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add is\add* our \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 89.18 \ft the \+nd LORD\+nd*…: or, our shield is of the \+nd LORD\+nd*, and our king is of the Holy One of Israel\f*

Then thou \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* in \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* to thy holy \w one|strong="H2623"\w*, and \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w laid|strong="H7737"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w* upon \add one that is\add* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*; I have \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* \add one\add* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* out of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; with my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* have I \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him:
With whom my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*: mine \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* also shall \w strengthen|strong="H0553"\w* him.
The \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* shall not \w exact|strong="H5378"\w* upon him; nor the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H5766"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* him.
And I will beat \w down|strong="H3807"\w* his \w foes|strong="H6862"\w* before his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w plague|strong="H5062"\w* them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him.

But my \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* and my \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add shall be\add* with him: and in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall his \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.
I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* also in the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* in the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.
He shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto me, Thou \add art\add* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
Also I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* him \add my\add* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w higher|strong="H5945"\w* than the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
My \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* will I \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* for him for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*, and my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* shall stand \w fast|strong="H0539"\w* with him.

His \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* also will I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \add to endure\add* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*, and his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* as the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.
If his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* not in my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*;
If they \w break|strong="H2490"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* not my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*;\f + \fr 89.31 \ft break: Heb. profane\f*
Then will I \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* their \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* with the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, and their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* with \w stripes|strong="H5061"\w*.

Nevertheless my \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* will I not utterly \w take|strong="H6331"\w* from him, nor suffer my \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* to \w fail|strong="H8266"\w*.\f + \fr 89.33 \ft will…: Heb. I will not make void from him\f*\f + \fr 89.33 \ft to fail: Heb. to lie\f*
My \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* will I not \w break|strong="H2490"\w*, nor \w alter|strong="H8138"\w* the thing that is gone \w out|strong="H4161"\w* of my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w Once|strong="H0259"\w* have I \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by my \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* that I will not \w lie|strong="H3576"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 89.35 \ft that…: Heb. if I lie\f*
His \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall endure for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* as the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* before me.

It shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* as the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*, and \add as\add* a \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H7834"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
But thou hast cast \w off|strong="H2186"\w* and \w abhorred|strong="H3988"\w*, thou hast been \w wroth|strong="H5674"\w* with thine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

Thou hast made \w void|strong="H5010"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: thou hast \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* his \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \add by casting it\add* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.
Thou hast broken \w down|strong="H6555"\w* all his \w hedges|strong="H1448"\w*; thou hast \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* his strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w* to \w ruin|strong="H4288"\w*.
All that pass \w by|strong="H5674"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w spoil|strong="H8155"\w* him: he is a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* to his \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*.
Thou hast set \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of his \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*; thou hast made all his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* to \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*.
Thou hast also \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* the \w edge|strong="H6697"\w* of his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and hast not made him to \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

Thou hast made his \w glory|strong="H2892"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H4048"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w down|strong="H4048"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 89.44 \ft glory: Heb. brightness\f*

The \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w youth|strong="H5934"\w* hast thou \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w*: thou hast \w covered|strong="H5844"\w* him with \w shame|strong="H0955"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

How long, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? wilt thou \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* thyself for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*? shall thy \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* like \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*?
\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* how \w short|strong="H2465"\w* my time is: wherefore hast thou \w made|strong="H1254"\w* all \w men|strong="H1121"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*?

What \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add is he that\add* \w liveth|strong="H2421"\w*, and shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*? shall he \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*? \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, where \add are\add* thy \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w lovingkindnesses|strong="H2617"\w*, \add which\add* thou \w swarest|strong="H7650"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in thy \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; \add how\add* I do \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* in my \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* \add the reproach of\add* all the \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

Wherewith thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* have \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; wherewith they have \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* the \w footsteps|strong="H6119"\w* of thine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, and \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.
